**Welcome!**

I'm Josh Pohlkamp-Hartt, a statistician and sports analytics professional from Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, Canada.

This site showcases my professional work, research publications, and personal insights at the intersection of data science and athletics. All perspectives and analyses presented here are my own unless explicitly attributed otherwise.

The navigation menu above provides access to my academic publications, professional biography and contact information.

I extend my deepest gratitude to my wife Liisa for her support throughout my professional journey.
